page.title: 15SARAH'S MUM'S TYPICAL DAY
page.content: I get up around 8:00am.I then make breakfast and do the children's school lunches.My husband usually takes the children to the bus stop,but if he has to leave early for work I take them.I then sit down and have my own breakfast and read the newspaper.After which I'll wash up the breakfast dishes and tidy up.Then I finish any washing left over.When that is done I start getting ready for work.At 11:30 I start my job in the local pub.I finish about 3:30pm.I then wait at the bus stop for my youngest child.If it's raining I go to pick my eldest up from the bus stop.I then go home,sit down for a quarter of an hour and have a cup of coffee.I then prepare the tea which we normally have about 6:00pm.After which I wash the dishes then sit and watch{I.T.V.}I go to bed round about midnight.
